main.name: Vatsal Safaya
main.occupation: A Freelance Developer and Graphic Designer
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe, Creativity and Development
main.bio: Hi there! I am Vatsal! You might also know me as TheCode5. I've been coding for over 6 years now. As a Frontend developer I've worked both with startups and small scale businesses to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in teaching and helping students to excel and pursue their dreams as a developers. With this passion, I have now trained some students across the globe. Through live coaching sessions on colaborating with different teaching institutions, I have accumulated good feedback, demonstrating how to apply developer skills in a range of cool builds. I deliver REAL VALUE by teaching REAL WORLD projects to help students enter the world of web development. Youâ€™ll get hands-on experience and learn the skills that are required to succeed in the real-world in this community.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the TheCode5 fam!

education.description: Have been a part of ROBOCON & SSIP.

work.title: App Developer
work.description: Designed, developed, and troubleshot software programs for databases and applications in Kotlin Java, and SQL. Developed some applications, added new features & debugged codes in Kotlin, Java, Swift & Dart. Worked as a Native Application Developer in both Android & iOS. Currently working as a Cross-Platform Application Developer. Turned in projects an average of 5% faster than targets. Worked with both SQL & NoSQL databases

work.title: Graphic Designer
work.description: Created custom graphics sets for clients, with 99% client satisfaction scores. Handled all composition, color, illustration, typography, and branding for client projects. Turned in projects an average of 5% faster than targets. Created custom graphics sets for clients, with 99% client satisfaction scores

work.title: Teacher
work.description: Teaching PYTHON & Data Structures and Algorithms

work.title: Campus Ambassador
work.description: Promoting courses and conducted a successful workshop

work.title: Team Member
work.description: Developing hardware mechanism for robot. Stood 7th NATIONALLY

work.title: Web Designer
work.description: Designed a website for my friend's startup. Redesign some websites for my clients. Designed custom graphics for a local print shop. Improved UX for website for a local church. Created custom graphics sets for clients, with 99% client satisfaction scores

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: Developed my own school's website.Developed a website for our school event with my team. Adapted front-end technologies to follow back-end development using React. Developed website components in JavaScript based on functional requirements and specifications

testimonials.text: Vatsal is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Vatsal has been AWESOME, he makes learning programming so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
It has been great working with Vatsal in a project & with him you learn a lot and that too in an easier way
